name: illegibly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is impossible or almost impossible to read because the writing or print is very untidy or not clear: The reports were illegibly written in pencil. He had good handwriting, but he typed almost illegibly. See
illegible
More examplesFewer examplesThe professor talks too fast and writes illegibly on the board.The name and address on the mailing envelope were written illegibly.Many of the medical certifications were handwritten, some illegibly.
